text:
And yet there is a rush to open schools for K- 8th.  Kids don’t live in a vacuum, they live with multigenerational families. @POTUS  schools need to be #vaccine sites. 

#VaccinateLACounty #VaccineAccessForAll #vaccinateschoolstaff #VaccinesforTeachers 
#schoolsreopening #COVID19 https://t.co/IlNJWkHaDZ
